attributes.action: create a cross party government that is reflective of the true accurate results of the election and that is not domineered by one party that does not have the majority of the people of the UK voting for it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government Positions should reflect party results in the election - the more seats you have , the more ministers you have - therefore a cross party government that represents all could govern all the UK residents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
